task.title: Clean up the security patch data for the "FROM" release

taskbody.context: This procedure provides instructions on how to remove security patches data from all the VMs. This data is present in /appdata/tmp. These rpms are security patches for the FROM release and they must be cleaned after the upgrade is successful as they have no use in the "TO" release. All steps in this procedure must be performed as the “root” user.

step.cmd: Log in to the NCC as the "root" user on OAME.
Cleanup the security patches data, if present, from /appdata/tmp using the following command.
